column2: sides and salads featuring ingredients from local farms. Sandwiches comes with two sides
column3: bringing your meal to $10-$12 per person. I think this is really reasonable
column4: they don't skimp on what goes inside your sandwich
column5: and all the ingredients are high quality. So far
column6: we have tried the duck confit
column9: and gulf shrimp and blue crab. I don't think you can go wrong with anything on the menu
column10: though I highly recommend the duck confit. It's sort of like a duck salad sandwich with cranberry preserve...it was really innovative and well executed. It's the perfect combination of savory and sweet. Most of the sides are not highly imaginative
column11: but they are good and compliment the sandwiches well. I quite like the red potato salad.
